title: unfair loss in promos (from player dodge)
body: this is utter bowlshit, I was in champ select and had a teamate who said he was going to dodge. it was mine and his turn to select champion but because he said he was gonna dodge I was distracted with the chat window, people were asking him why. well I FORGOT to lock in my champ he didn't lock in his so it would have been a dodge anyway BUT now I have an extra loss on my promos because of it. this is completely unfair (

replies.body: Ah snap that really sucks. I can understand where you'd be pretty distracted by someone threatening to dodge in your promos. The good thing though is that since we're in preseason, promos don't mean as much as they do when the season is in full effect, and you didn't actually get any penalties for that.
